member.name: T:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Blip
member.summary: Blip class that stores all data related to a single blip.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Blip.Name
member.summary: The text to display on the blip in the map menu

member.summary: ID of the sprite to use, can be found on the ALTV wiki

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Blip.Color
member.summary: Blip Color code, can also be found on the ALTV wiki

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Blip.Scale
member.summary: Scale of the blip, 1 is regular size.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Blip.ShortRange
member.summary: Whether this blip can be seen on the minimap from anywhere on the map, or only when close to it(it will always show on the main map).

member.name: M:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Blip.Delete
member.summary: Destroy this blip.

member.name: T:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker
member.summary: DynamicMarker class that stores all data related to a single marker.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.Rotation
member.summary: Set or get the current marker's rotation (in degrees).

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.TextureDict
member.summary: Set a texture dictionary, pass null to remove.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.TextureName
member.summary: Texture name, only applicable if TextureDict is set. pass null to reset value.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.Rotate
member.summary: Whether the marker should rotate on the Y axis(heading).

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.DrawOnEnter
member.summary: Whether the marker should be drawn onto the entity when they enter it.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.FaceCamera
member.summary: Whether the marker should rotate on the Y axis towards the player's camera.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.BobUpDown
member.summary: Whether the marker should bob up and down.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.Scale
member.summary: Set scale of the marker.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.Direction
member.summary: Represents a heading on each axis in which the marker should face, alternatively you can rotate each axis independently with Rotation and set Direction axis to 0.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.MarkerType
member.summary: Set or get the current marker's type(see MarkerTypes enum).

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.Color
member.summary: Set marker color.

member.name: M:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Marker.Destroy
member.summary: Destroy this marker.
Create a new dynamic marker
member.param: The type of marker to spawn.
The position at which the marker should spawn at.
Whether the marker should bob up and down.
Whether the marker should face the entity's camera.
Whether the marker should rotate on the Y axis only.
An optional texture dictionary to apply to the marker.
An optional texture name to apply to the marker.
Whether it should draw the marker onto an entity that intersects with it.
Stream distance of the marker, default is 100.

member.name: T:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Prop
member.summary: DynamicObject class that stores all data related to a single object

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Prop.Rotation
member.summary: Set or get the current object's rotation (in degrees).

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Prop.Model
member.summary: Set or get the current object's model.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Prop.LodDistance
member.summary: Set or get LOD Distance of the object.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Prop.TextureVariation
member.summary: Get or set the current texture variation, use null to reset it to default.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Prop.Dynamic
member.summary: Get or set the object's dynamic state. Some objects can be moved around by the player when dynamic is set to true.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Prop.Visible
member.summary: Set/get visibility state of object

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Prop.OnFire
member.summary: Set/get an object on fire, NOTE: does not work very well as of right now, fire is very small.

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Prop.Freeze
member.summary: Freeze an object into it's current position. or get it's status

member.name: P:Altv_Roleplay.EntityStreamer.Prop.LightColor
member.summary: Set the light color of the object, use null to reset it to default.
Create a new dynamic object.
member.param: The position to spawn the object at.
The rotation to spawn the object at(degrees).
The dimension to spawn the object in.
(Optional): set object on fire(DOESN'T WORK PROPERLY YET!)
(Optional): The range that a player has to be in before the object spawns, default value is 400.

member.summary: Get the dynamic object that's closest to a specified position.

member.returns: The closest dynamic object to the specified position, or null if none found.
